title: E-commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with real-time inventory management and payment integration
longDescription: Built a comprehensive e-commerce solution using React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include user authentication, product management, shopping cart, order tracking, and Stripe payment integration. Implemented real-time inventory updates using WebSockets.

title: AI Chat Application
description: Real-time chat application with AI-powered message suggestions and sentiment analysis
longDescription: Developed a modern chat application integrating OpenAI's GPT for intelligent message suggestions and sentiment analysis. Built with Next.js, Socket.io for real-time communication, and PostgreSQL for data persistence.

title: Task Management System
description: Collaborative project management tool with kanban boards and team analytics
longDescription: Created a comprehensive task management system with drag-and-drop kanban boards, team collaboration features, real-time updates, and detailed analytics dashboards. Supports multiple projects, custom workflows, and integrations.

title: Mobile Fitness Tracker
description: Cross-platform mobile app for tracking workouts, nutrition, and health metrics
longDescription: Built a comprehensive fitness tracking mobile application using React Native. Features include workout logging, nutrition tracking, progress visualization, social features, and integration with wearable devices.

title: DevOps Dashboard
description: Monitoring and deployment dashboard for containerized applications
longDescription: Developed a comprehensive DevOps dashboard for monitoring and managing containerized applications. Includes CI/CD pipeline visualization, resource monitoring, log aggregation, and automated deployment capabilities.
